# Conditionals

# Conditional from data

# Input:

Â 


















<template>
  <div>
    <p v-if="showing">"See me"<span> and its childs</span></p>
    <!-- The other value are NOT in the DOM -->
    <p v-else-if="!showing">Second option</p>
    <p v-else>Can't see me</p>
  </div>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data: function() {
    return {
      showing: true,
    };
  },
};
</script>
1

# Output:

"See me" and its childs

<template>
  <div>
    <p v-if="showing">"See me"<span> and its childs</span></p>
    <!-- The other value are NOT in the DOM -->
    <p v-else-if="!showing">Second option</p>
    <p v-else>Can't see me</p>
  </div>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data: function() {
    return {
      showing: true,
    };
  },

<template>
  <div>
    <p v-if="showing">"See me"<span> and its childs</span></p>
    <!-- The other value are NOT in the DOM -->
    <p v-else-if="!showing">Second option</p>
    <p v-else>Can't see me</p>
  </div>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data: function() {
    return {
      showing: true,
    };
  },

</script>

# Conditional with JS in template

# Input:


Â 





Â 











<template>
  <div>
    <p v-if="showing">"See me"<span> and its childs</span></p>
    <!-- The other value are NOT in the DOM -->
    <p v-else-if="!showing">Second option</p>
    <p v-else>Can't see me</p>
  </div>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data: function() {
    return {
      showing: true,
    };
  },
};
</script>
